Many Palestinians have
received medical treatment in Egyptian hospitals
after the country allowed the evacuation of
people from Gaza through the border gate to the
Egyptian border gate. Egyptian officials said they had prepared 38
hospitals in eight cities.  The locality is ready
to receive more patients who are injured and
need psychological support.
A spokesman for the World Health Organization
said An arish hospital is the
first hospital in Egypt to agree to
accept people from Gaza.  This health department
is coordinating to set up a patient triage system.
I hope that my husband and
son who are still stuck in Gaza will be able to
come here soon. I am heartbroken to leave
my son there. He is only 12 years old.
My husband is also injured so he
can't help.
Hospitals in many other countries also
said they are ready to support Egypt. On
November 15, the first flight brought 27
cancer patients from An Aris hospital
to the capital.  However, according to the
International Committee of the Red Cross,
security risks related to
civilian evacuations are still high. Egypt
said it is ready to send its ambulances
into Gaza to help.  Evacuate people.
However, it is necessary to ensure a safe route.
Yesterday, the
US Southern New York prosecutor's office announced the
largest seizure of counterfeit goods ever
in the country's history. Two subjects were arrested.  The
Homeland Security Investigation Office
in New York and the New York City Police Department
seized about 219,000
handbags, clothing, shoes and
other counterfeit products according to the
New York Southern District Attorney's Office.  York damian Williams
total value of goods If sold on
the market is estimated at more than 1 billion
US dollars Amada 38 years old and ABD J 48 years old were
charged with trafficking in counterfeit goods two subjects
were arrested on the morning of November 15  According to
the indictment, the two ran a
large-scale counterfeit goods operation from a
storage facility in Manhattan. These crimes
carry a maximum sentence of 10 years.
More than 3,000 tarik jaac turtles were
released into the environment.  naturally in the Peruvian nan river
This is an effort to preserve
this endangered animal in
the rivers of the Amazon river basin.
The above turtle was released into the wild in the
town of San Jose de Lana in Northern Peru.  The
mayor and school activists
released more than 3,200 newly hatched baby tarik turtles
under the curiosity of many
children. This activity includes many aspects
such as social, economic and cultural through
environmental education through which  conveying
the message of wildlife conservation
in addition to reintroducing the
project's target species is working with organizations in
local and national communities to
conserve the biodiversity of the Amazon.
more than 20,000 tarika turtles have been released into
tributaries of the
Amazon River. This time, thousands of
swans have begun to migrate to
Rongen National Nature Reserve in Shandong Province,
China.  This natural statue
has made many people excited to
come here to
admire it. According to statistics, every year there are more than
10,000 Dong cygnet swans at
Rong Chen swan lake in the reserve.
This is an ecological environment in which they
feel comfortable.  comfortable and suitable when winter
comes, many tourists also take the opportunity to come
here to take photos with the seven swans. I have to
travel more than 400 kilometers to see
this group of swans, especially when the sun goes down, it
creates a beautiful scene.  I didn't think
swans could get
along so well with humans. When
you come close to take photos, they are not afraid at
all, proving that the environment here is very
comfortable for them. Every year, the
swans will  migrating from Siiri and Ho Ban
to this area they will stay for
about 5 months from October to March of the
following year when the weather is

Ma city, the fire occurred at about 5:00 p.m. on the same
day at

flammable and explosive items such as chlorine and lime fertilizers.  Many
other chemicals made firefighting
difficult. After more than 3 hours of

no loss of life. The cause
and damage of the fire are being

Dong Xoai city, Binh Phuoc province, causing
two houses to be
damaged around 9:00 a.m. on the same day, people
heard loud noises and discovered fire and smoke
rising from a house in
Thanh Binh neighborhood, Tan Binh ward.  In just
a few moments, the fire spread to a
neighboring house. After on-site firefighting efforts
failed, people reported to the authorities.
Binh Phuoc province's fire prevention and fighting force dispatched two
fire engines in line.  Dozens of officers and soldiers
arrived to put out the fire after 30 minutes. The fire was under
control. However, two houses were
severely damaged. There were no
people in the two houses at the time of the fire, so no
human damage was caused by the cause of the fire.

Fortunately, there was no one

Fertilizer circulating on Highway
14 from Dong Xoai city to
Dak Nong province When arriving at the intersection with
Nguyen Chanh street, Thanh Binh quarter,
Tan Binh ward, the tractor lost control and crashed into
the back of a truck that was stopping to wait.  A
seven-seater car in front crossed the road with a
strong impact and pushed the truck forward, crashing into the
seven-seater car, causing it to stick to the
median after the accident. Three vehicles were
seriously damaged. Dozens of bags of fertilizer were on the
front vehicle.  Luckily, there were
no casualties.
